channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Update Modified River Rescue; INC#0283; 08:00AM; 356 LA River; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uCoyaH; #BoyleHeights; Firefighters assisted LAPD and the Medical Examiner with the body recovery of a deceased adult male in the flood control channel, using a rigid stretcher ("basket") with ropes coming from the tip of an aerial ladder truck. Nothing further.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AO1 AO2 BC1 E4 E447 H4 H6 H7 HA4 HA6 HA7 RA17 RA90 T9; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Modified River Rescue; INC#0283; 06:25AM; 356 LA River; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uCoyaH; #BoyleHeights; Firefighters are responding to a deceased person in the river (in a few inches of water flowing) and LAFD Crews are assessing the situation to assist with the body recovery. Rail traffic and 7th Street bridge traffic will be affected. ; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AO1 AO2 BC1 E4 E447 H4 H6 H7 HA4 HA6 HA7 RA17 RA90 T9; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1332; 05:45PM; 11157 S Central Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uxzczq; #GreenMeadows; Two-story boarded-up commercial structure with smoke showing from the first floor. Firefighters made entry to locate a contents-only fire inside of the building, where they found that this was the site of a previous burn. It took 32 firefighters 17 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E33 E64 E65 FR64 RA264 RA864 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1112; 03:41PM; 4832 W Rosewood Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/49aEmQY; #Larchmont; Twenty-six firefighters responded to smoke coming from the parking (ground) level under residential units. Firefighters confined the fire to just an automobile, and extinguished the flames in 12 minutes. No reported injury. Cause unknown.; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC5 E227 E29 E52 E6 RA82 RA829 SO1 T27 T29; CH7; 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1112; 03:29PM; 4832 W Rosewood Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/49aEmQY; #Larchmont; Three-story apartment with moderate smoke showing. Offensive mode. ; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC5 E227 E29 E52 E6 RA82 RA829 T27 T29; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0280; 06:55AM; 4922 S Sycamore Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/48emZ0n; DelRey; LAFD (with assistance from Culver City FD) battled flames in a fully-engulfed one-story single family home that appeared to be vacant. It took 37 LAFD firefighters 41 minutes to extinguish the flames, holding the fire to the unit-of-origin. After eliminating the blaze, two patients were found inside. One was transported in unknown condition, and sadly, another was deceased. PIO Captain Adam Van Gerpen is en route for media needs. ETA approximately 7:30am.; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; AR1 BC4 BC9 CM40 CM42 E205 E292 E43 E462 E5 EM18 PI2 RA43 RA62 RA862 T5 T92; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0280; 06:14AM; 4918 S Sycamore Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/48emZ0n; #DelRey; Vacant one-story home with heavy fire showing. Offensive mode. ; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 BC9 E205 E292 E43 E462 E5 RA62 RA862 T5 T92; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#1559; 08:44PM; Jeffrey Mark Ct; MAP: https://bit.ly/42B7HBy; #Chatsworth; An adult male was stranded in a remote area west of Chatsworth Park South, where bystanders heard cries for help. LAFD responded by ground and air to assist. Rescuers made contact with the man, who had minor injures, and hoisted him from the remote location, and making a "short haul" to a nearby helispot (predetermined helicopter landing area), where he was transferred to an LAFD ambulance for paramedic assessment and transport to a local hospital for further evaluation. Nothing further.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC15 E106 E107 E296 H0B H4 H7 HA4 HA7 RA107 RH114 T96; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0797; 12:58PM; 11937 S Hoover St; MAP: https://bit.ly/49QnZcv; #VermontVista; Firefighters responded to a one-story row of bungalows with fire in the common attic, but just over one unit. Crews quickly extended hose lines into the structure to apply water to the seat of the fire, and ascended ladders to the roof for vertical ventilation, allowing the smoke and heated gases to escape. Ultimately, it took 31 firefighters 25 minutes to extinguish the flames. Crews confined the flames to only the unit of origin, and prevented any damage to the adjoining units. No reported (human) injuries, as no one was home at the time of the fire. Sadly, one canine was found deceased inside. Cause under investigation.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC11 BC13 BC18 CM20 CM22 E221 E233 E264 E46 E57 E64 E65 E66 E79 EM13 RA57 RA864 T21 T33 T64; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0797; 12:33PM; 11937 S Hoover St; MAP: https://bit.ly/49QnZcv; #VermontVista; One-story row of bungalows with smoke showing from the common attic. Offensive mode.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC11 BC13 BC18 CM20 CM22 E221 E233 E264 E46 E57 E65 E66 E79 EM13 RA57 RA864 T21 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange
